name: Best Com. Chillers, Env., PC (EE+DF)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Installed cost in $/kBtu/h for high efficiency chillers in 2023; assumes no additional cost for load shifting capabilities

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetimes for high efficiency chillers in 2023

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2018 - Table E1 -  Major fuels consumption by end use, 2018
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Ventilation fraction is portion of ventilation consumption in commercial buildings where building cooling is served by a central chiller (230 TBtus / 728 TBtus).

_description: Adjust heating/cooling set point down/up to shed peak period electricity use, pair with passive thermal energy storage and envelope/HVAC equipment efficiency generally corresponding to AEDG 50% guideline across building types
_notes: Measure Definition and Status Google spreadsheet contains calculations for combining chiller and commercial envelope measures and converting units
